name: RNZ(RadioNewZealand)FlashBriefing
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, what's in the news?”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des: The latest news bulletin from RNZ (Radio New Zealand), New Zealand’s 100% ad-free multimedia public broadcaster. Listen to the latest breaking news read by Radio New Zealand newsreaders fresh every hour, 24 hours a day, 7 days a week.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
